parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The ID of the instance. Separate multiple IDs with commas (,). A maximum of 100 IDs can be specified.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The region in which the instance resides.

parameters.name: RenewStatus
parameters.description:
The method that is used to renew the instance. Valid values:

AutoRenewal: automatically renews the instance.

ManualRenewal: manually renews the instance.

NotRenewal: does not renew the instance.

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description:
The billing method. Valid values:

Subscription: the subscription billing method.

PayAsYouGo: the pay-as-you-go billing method.
